SELECT buildname AS buildName, buildcode as buildCode,estatename as comunityName, estatecode as comunityCode FROM base_build WHERE buildcode NOT IN ( SELECT build_code FROM admin_building_bind WHERE usercode = #{usercode} )
AND buildname like CONCAT('%',#{buildName},'%')
AND estatename like CONCAT('%',#{communityName},'%')

SELECT id, build_name AS buildName, build_code as buildCode,comunity_name as comunityName, comunity_code as comunityCode,username, phone, default_phone_open as phoneOpen FROM admin_building_bind WHERE (1=1)
AND usercode = #{usercode}
AND build_name like CONCAT('%',#{buildName},'%')
AND comunity_name like CONCAT('%',#{communityName},'%')
AND username like CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
AND phone like CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')
